Detailed Description

Objects in PikaScript.

PikaObjects is a simple extension to PikaScript that provides techniques for working with objects in PikaScript and interfacing with objects in C++. The PikaScript source "objects.pika" contains the PikaScript library and this file contains a sub-class of Pika::Script that adds some classes and functions that help you interfacing PikaScript with your C++ objects.

Definition in file PikaObjects.h.
